name: [Prototype] Trump vs Clinton game
description:
A couple advices:

1) Play fullscreen. Go to fullscreen BEFORE starting the game, you'll need space a lot.

2) Get your computer mouse on.

3) Jump more to evade bullets.

4) If you are stack in the background, go to the opposite side and jump. If it doesn't help, restart the game.

5) Your bullets destroy enemies' bullets.
